mapper.select: select diag_inspection_id, bundle_code, bundle_name, pres_code, pres_name, pres_unit, pres_lower_limit, pres_upper_limit, pres_vessel, pres_specimen_name from diagnostic_inspections where bundle_name like CONCAT('%', #{bundleName}, '%')

select diag_inspection_id, bundle_code, bundle_name, pres_code, pres_name, pres_unit, pres_lower_limit, pres_upper_limit, pres_vessel, pres_specimen_name from diagnostic_inspections where bundle_code like CONCAT('%', #{bundleCode}, '%')

select diag_inspection_id, bundle_code, bundle_name, pres_code, pres_name, pres_unit, pres_lower_limit, pres_upper_limit, pres_vessel, pres_specimen_name from diagnostic_inspections where diag_inspection_id = #{diagInspectionId}
